entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 10:26 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %

Dewpoint: -4.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 overnight then light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
